thread.section_title: Regent Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful Hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful Hotel - Review of Regent Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Showme52
title: Beautiful Hotel
text: We enjoyed three evenings on the 18th floor at this beautiful hotel. The rooms are spacious and the floor to ceiling windows gave us a wonderful view of the city. A wonderful breakfast buffet is served every morning with both Chinese and American choices. The staff was courteous and helpful.
